name: Shop A
description: Shop A is a popular electronics store known for its wide range of gadgets and excellent customer service.

interactivePoints.text: Welcome to Shop A! We have the latest gadgets available here.
Check out our new arrivals section for the latest products.
Our customer service desk is here to help you with any queries.
Explore our wide range of smartphones and accessories.
We offer the best deals on laptops and computers.
Don't miss our special discounts on home appliances.

name: Shop B
description: Shop B is a cozy bookstore with a vast collection of books from various genres.

interactivePoints.text: Welcome to Shop B! Find your next great read here.
Check out our bestsellers section for the most popular books.
Our reading corner is the perfect place to relax and enjoy a book.
Explore our collection of rare and antique books.
Join our book club for exciting discussions and events.
We offer personalized book recommendations based on your interests.
